EmailTemplate.name: 2019 Dealer Update #5.2019 Dealer Update #5
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Sales & NEXT Bulletins Update - December 17, 2018
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Sales Bulletins | December 2018
Aircraft Personality Module Pricing for JetWave Equipped Aircraft
- The purpose of this Honeywell Sales Bulletin is to inform our dealers of the pricing and lead time associated with APM files. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2019-20 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-20 APM Pricing.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
DU-875 Display Unit Promotion
- Take advantage of savings through multiple upgrade paths. - Here are the following NEXT Bulletins:
- 2019_N_10 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019_N_10 Primus Elite Advanced Features for Bombardier Aircraft.pdf]]> Primus Elite Advanced Features for Bombardier Aircraft - 2019_N_11 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019_N_11 Primus Elite Advanced Features for the Dassault 900EX and 900C.pdf]]> Primus Elite Advanced Features for the Dassault 900EX and 900C - 2019_N_12 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019_N_12 DU-875 Display Upgrade for Citation 550 and 560.pdf]]> DU-875 Display Upgrade for Citation 550 and 560 - 2019_N_13 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019_N_13 Primus Elite Upgrade for the Citation X.pdf]]> Primus Elite Upgrade for the Citation X - 2019_N_14 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019_N_14 Primus Elite Upgrade for the Lear 40-45.pdf]]> Primus Elite Upgrade for the Lear 40-45 - 2019_N_15 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019_N_15 Primus Elite Advanced Features for the Legacy 600 and 650.pdf]]> Primus Elite Advanced Features for the Legacy 600 and 650
- Dealers can find 2019 NEXT bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
GoDirect Router
- This router boasts a small size, low weight and many advanced features. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-13 Aspire 200 with HDR for Helicopters.pdf]]>2019-21 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-21%20GoDirect Cabin Router for Business Aircraft.pdf]]> <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-13 Aspire 200 with HDR for Helicopters.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
